Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+{
+  "name": "gitvan",
+  "version": "2.0.0",
+  "description": "Git-native development automation platform",
+  "type": "module",
+  "main": "src/index.mjs",
+  "bin": {
+    "gitvan": "bin/gitvan.mjs"
+  },
+  "scripts": {
+    "test": "vitest",
+    "build": "echo 'Build step'",
+    "dev": "node bin/gitvan.mjs"
+  },
+  "keywords": [
+    "git",
+    "automation",
+    "development",
+    "cli",
+    "templates",
+    "jobs"
+  ],
+  "author": "GitVan Team",
+  "license": "MIT",
+  "dependencies": {
+    "citty": "^0.1.6",
+    "consola": "^3.2.3",
+    "pathe": "^2.0.3",
+    "unctx": "^2.4.1",
+    "nunjucks": "^3.2.4",
+    "gray-matter": "^4.0.3",
+    "toml": "^3.0.0",
+    "zod": "^4.1.8",
+    "c12": "^2.0.4",
+    "defu": "^6.1.4",
+    "hookable": "^5.5.3",
+    "klona": "^2.0.6",
+    "inflection": "^3.0.2",
+    "currency.js": "^2.0.4",
+    "tinyglobby": "^0.2.15",
+    "unrouting": "^0.0.1"
+  },
+  "devDependencies": {
+    "vitest": "^1.0.0",
+    "@types/node": "^20.19.15",
+    "@types/nunjucks": "^3.2.6",
+    "eslint": "^9.35.0",
+    "eslint-config-unjs": "^0.5.0"
+  },
+  "engines": {
+    "node": ">=18.0.0"
+  }
+}
\ No newline at end of file
